meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unassuming.
meanings.sent1: Her unassumingnesses made her a favorite among her classmates.
meanings.sent2: His unassumingnesses shone through in his humble demeanor.
meanings.sent3: The unassumingnesses of the small puppy brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The unassumingnesses of the old tree in the forest was a stark contrast to the grandeur of the surrounding trees.
meanings.sent5: The unassumingnesses of the librarian masked a wealth of knowledge and wisdom.

meanings.sent1: The unassumingnesses of the new employee impressed the team.
meanings.sent2: Her unassumingnesses made her easy to approach and talk to.
meanings.sent3: The unassumingnesses of the cat pretending not to care about the toy was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of noise, her unassumingnesses was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The unassumingnesses of the painting drew the viewer in, inviting them to explore its depths.
